document.full_text: in a major grammys overhaul designed to reduce the bloated structure of the music industry's top awards, organizers said on wednesday they would slash the number of categories to 78 from 109 for next year's ceremony.
document.title: grammy awards cut 31 categories in big overhaul
lines_and_colors: in a major grammys overhaul designed to reduce the bloated structure of the music industry's top awards, organizers said on wednesday they would slash the number of categories to 78 from 109 for next year's ceremony.
